recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 2. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. 3. Add the stock and mix well. 4. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 5. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 6. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 7. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 2. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. 3. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 4. Serve with a slaw of your choice
